title: Expert Bookkeeper (AU Experience | Xero Specialist
job_overview:
We’re Hiring!

Are you an experienced and detail-oriented Bookkeeper who understands the Australian financial landscape? We’re looking for someone with at least 3 years of experience working with Australian clients using Xero, who is committed to accuracy, timeliness, and proactive communication.

You’ll play a key role in maintaining financial integrity for our clients and ensuring compliance with Australian tax laws.

Key Responsibilities:

- Maintain accurate and up-to-date financial records using Xero
- Ensure 100?curacy in bank and credit card reconciliations
- Process accounts payable and receivable
- Monitor invoice collection cycles and maintain < 30 days
- Prepare and lodge BAS, IAS, and superannuation obligations — 100% on time
- Process payroll accurately and on schedule, compliant with Australian labor laws
- Reconcile GST, PAYG, and other statutory liabilities
- Generate monthly financial reports and cash flow statements by the 5th business day
- Liaise with Australian accountants or tax agents
- Respond to finance-related queries within 24 hours
- Assist in budgeting, forecasting, and audit preparation
- Maintain confidentiality and ensure data integrity
- Identify and implement improvements in systems and processes

Ideal Candidate Profile:
- Minimum 3 years of bookkeeping experience with Australian clients
- Proficient in Xero (certification preferred)
- Strong understanding of Australian tax laws, BAS, GST, and payroll
- Highly accurate and detail-focused
- Excellent time management and organizational skills
- Strong verbal and written communication skills
- Takes full ownership of tasks and delivers without the need for micromanagement
- Comfortable working remotely with minimal supervision
- Has a strong sense of integrity, responsibility, and confidentiality
- Proactively communicates with internal and external stakeholders
- Constantly seeks ways to improve systems and financial processes
- Understands both the big picture and the small details
- Treats the client’s business as their own — trustworthy and dependable

Tools You’ll Be Using:

Xero

GoHighLevel (GHL)

Airwallex

Google Workspace (G Suite)

What We Offer:
- Long-term full-time role
- Stable work environment with a supportive team
- Opportunity to grow professionally and contribute meaningfully
- Remote work flexibility

How to Apply:
Please send a link to your resume to apply and a short cover letter highlighting your experience with Australian clients and Xero. Candidates who meet the criteria will be contacted for a skills assessment and interview. :)
